item.title: Amazon S3 and CSS
item.description: After I deployed my blog to Amazon S3, I realized that there was no CSS applied to the pages. In Octopress, the look and feel of website is managed by stylesheets/screen.css. It was fine in rake preview but not on the S3 bucket. I looked around for a few hours to no avail. There was one other person who had the same issue on [stackoverflow] stackoverflowlink but no answers. Relevant [xkcd] xkcdlink:
